abstract: Though many have dismissed it over the years as not being part of Wall Street’s top echelon, Bank of America, based in Charlotte, N.C., is standing fairly tall these days — at least, when compared with some of the humbled investment banks in up north.
lead_paragraph: Though many have dismissed it over the years as not being part of Wall Street’s top echelon, Bank of America, based in Charlotte, N.C., is standing fairly tall these days — at least, when compared with some of the humbled investment banks in up north.

headline.main: BofA Chief Sounds Confident in ’60 Minutes’ Interview
